About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, my name is Tiffany Sims and I reside in the Chicago area. I am a graduate from Chicago State Universiy with a B.s in Computer Science. I became interested in coding about 7 years ago. I took an intro to programming course and fell in love. I made a commitment to develop as a technical professional. The first language I learned was c++ and during my senior year I tutored c++. In 2017, while researching possible career paths. I came across a video about web development. I've been learning ever since. I enjoy the fact that I can be creative as well as a programmer. The most valuable asset that I can provide to your company is the ability to be molded to your stack.

Computer Science

While earning my CS degree I learned the design and development of software. I learned to understand and think critically about problems.

Front End Developer

I have experience with building responsive and progressive web applications. I am versed in front-end development languages including, HTML5, CSS3, Javascipt, React, and a host of tools and libraries. I am currently learning with PHP.

HTML Email Developer

I have created PSD to HTML emails using tables and inline CSS styling and testing with litmus.
